name: Hiram & Solomon - Traveling Man - Gran Toro
additionalNotes:
Founded by two life-long Freemasons, each Hiram & Solomon cigar is named after a term used by the Freemasons. Proceeds from the sale of their cigars goes to charities such as the Shriners Hospital for Children. Hiram & Solomon cigars are handmade by Plasencia Cigars in Nicaragua. Celebrated for 
Artistry and a commitment to quality and consistency go into every Hiram & Solomon cigar, providing reason for our brand to sit proudly beside the world’s most respected and enjoyed brands of premium cigars. Smoking one is a complete experience, memorable and thought-provoking from beginning to end. Hiram & Solomon Cigars are premium quality handmade cigars that match the caliber of the Brethren and the spirit they embody for all to enjoy.
